gw.api.admin

Class MessagingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.MessagingUtil

  • public class MessagingUtil
extends Object
    Provides utility functions supporting messaging admin screens.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Map<Integer,String> EventMessageDestinationMap
      Returns a map of destination to destination name

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<Integer,String> getEventMessageDestinationMap()
      Returns a map of destination to destination name
      static EventMessage[] getEventMessages(Long sooKeyValue)
      Find all messages related to the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object are returned.
      static IQueryBeanResult<Message> getEventMessagesForDestination(Integer destId, Long sooKeyValue, int pageSize)
      Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
      static EventMessage[] getEventMessagesForDestination(Integer destId, Long sooKeyValue)
      Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
      static Message getMessage(Long messageId)
      Looks up a message object based on the supplied ID.
      static boolean isEventRegisteredForDestination(int destinationID, String eventName)
      Determines if event is registered for the destination.
      static void removeMessageHistory(Date before)
      Remove all messages in the message history table that are older than the specified date.
      static void restartDestinations(DestinationMessageStatistics[] dests, int timeToTryInSecs)
      Restart message destinations in the supplied array of destinations.
      static void restartMessageEngine()
      Restarts the messaging system, reloading all pending messages from the database.
      static void resumeDestinations(DestinationMessageStatistics[] dests)
      Resumes message sending to suspended destinations in the supplied array of destinations.
      static void resyncPrimaryObject(int destinationID, int primaryObjectKey)
      Drops all pending messages and generates a resync event for the specified destination and primary object.
      static void resyncPrimaryObjectForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
      Drops all pending messages and generates a resync event for each of the primary objects identified by the supplied array of statistics objects.
      static void retryBlockingMessageForPrimaryObject(int destinationID, int primaryObjectKey)
      Retries a message in error status for the specified destination and primary object (such as a claim).
      static void retryMessagesForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
      Retries the specified messages (extracting the message ids from the supplied statistics objects).
      static void retryRetryableMessages(Message[] messages)
      Retries all messages in retryable state. This should be used for cross-primary objects.
      static void retryRetryableMessages(EventMessage[] messages)
      Retries all messages in retryable state. This should be used for cross-primary objects.
      static void skipBlockingMessagesForStats(SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics[] stats)
      Skips any messages in error status for the specified primary objects (extracted from the provided array of statistics objects).
      static void skipMessages(Message[] messages)
      Skips all of the specified messages. The messages will be removed from the send queue and not dispatched.
      static void skipMessages(EventMessage[] messages)
      Skips all of the specified messages. The messages will be removed from the send queue and not dispatched.

      Suspend message sending to the specified destinations.

      • isEventRegisteredForDestination

        boolean isEventRegisteredForDestination(int destinationID,
                                      String eventName)
        Determines if event is registered for the destination.
        Parameters:
        destinationID - the destination
        eventName - the event name
        Returns:
        true if the event is registered for the destination, false otherwise.

      • removeMessageHistory

        void removeMessageHistory(Date before)
        Remove all messages in the message history table that are older than the specified date.
        Parameters:
        before - the cutoff date for which all messages that are older than this date are deleted.
